title: It's easy when you know how
creator_credit: South Australian Film Corporation, Nicholas Cockram and Brian Bergin
brief_description: Children who have difficulty in learning may be lacking in the basic skills of the spoken or written language. They may appear to be dull, difficult, dyslexic or handicapped but step by step teaching may reveal that they have the ability to learn.
